#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
int main()
{
    ll t;cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {
        ll a,n,ans=0;
        cin>>n;
        if(n==1)
        ans=1;
       else if(n==2)
        ans=2;
        else if(n==3)
        ans=2;
        else if(n==4)
        ans=4;
        else
        {
            ll n1=((log10(n))/(log10(2)));
            ans=1<<n1;

        }
        cout<<ans<<endl;
        }
}
